data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 27040, Version Hash: b630e547429da7fbd071f5d67abf1367976d42cc
data.actual_result: Nothin will happen. The PopUp will close but the role override will stay there
data.expected_result: The role override should be gone/deleted
data.short_description: Cannot remove a role from the permission override in a channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Press "Edit Channel" to edit any channel - Go to "Permissions" - Make sure you have a Roles/Members override (If not create one) - Edit the permissions of any Role/Member or @everyone - Do not press the "Save Changes" that pops up - Switch to any other Role/Member override - Scroll down and press "Remove " - On the PopUp press "Okay"
